Enum EasyFiltering.TextureFiltering

  • java.lang.Object

    public static enum EasyFiltering.TextureFiltering
extends java.lang.Enum<EasyFiltering.TextureFiltering>
    Texture filtering modes.

    • Enum Constant Summary

      Enum Constants 
      Enum Constant and Description
      ANISOTROPIC_16X
      16x anisotropic texture filtering.
      ANISOTROPIC_2X
      2x anisotropic texture filtering.
      ANISOTROPIC_4X
      4x anisotropic texture filtering.
      ANISOTROPIC_8X
      8x anisotropic texture filtering.
      BILINEAR
      Bilinear texture filtering.
      NONE
      No texture filtering.
      TRILINEAR
      Trilinear texture filtering.
